channel.title: Barrows coding help
channel.description: Ok, im trying to make barrows 100% and i have looked everywhere for the crypts xy positions and no luck, whats the coordinats for the 6 brothers crypts right after you use your spade on top of their crypt? Im sorry if this is in the section but I thought this was were i should have posted this.

item.title: Barrows coding help
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“demonlover14, post:2, topic:340008”]Just a hint.
Your barrows won’t be 100%(By looking for a guide.)
Noone has posted 100% chest rewards.
100% npc gfxs and pop ups.
100% npc dailouge.
100% digging.
100% random tunnel.
100% npcs.
100% puzzels
Not flaming just letting you know.[/quote]

He isn’t looking for a guide. He is simply asking what are the coordinates of the tombs. 100% barrows isn’t that hard of a task, even for a beginner as long as they try.

@Topic:

I’m not really sure of the coordinates. I found a few barrows coordinates in an old list, so try these:

X: 3551 Y: 9712
X: 3564 Y: 3288
X: 3568 Y: 9695
X: 3551 Y: 9694

Read full topic
